page.title: 17Farming.
page.content: {Ockwells Manor Home Farm.}For our Domesday Project we phoned up a farm called Ockwells Manor home farm to ask some questions. We asked what crops they grow and they said it was not a farm any more just a house. {Foxley Farm.}Foxley Farm has not many animals. They keep one calf and some cattle they have no pigs, poultry or sheep. Foxley farm has 15 tractors and one combine havester. There are 60 helpers on the farm not including the owner.Farming has been in their family for 100 years. The farmers favourite aspect of farming is the serious side of it. For crops they grow veg and wheat.
